features: Durability - Our Stainless Steel Straight Razor Kit is made with the highest quality materials, making it strong, safe and lasting.
Precise Shave- The Straight Razor Blades provide a smooth and close shave, leaving the skin without any irritation.
Ergonomic Handle - The ergonomic handle produces a better grip and easier maneuvering for the perfect shave.
Crisp Lines- Perfect for edging and maintaining clean crisp lines around the sides and back of the hairline
The Viking Promise:- We are so confident that you are going to love this Safety Razor, that if for any reason you are not completely satisfied, simply contact us and we'll take care of it

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Join the Viking Revolution Our team is whole heartedly committed to making sure that each product we offer is of the highest quality, using only premium materials. Grow and care for your beard or mustache with our grooming products in complete confidence. Our results speak for themselves and we back all our beard care treatments and accessories.

The Viking Experience Beard care is a passionate affair. Whatever the style, color, length or shape of your facial hair, we take looking after it very seriously, because your beard is going to make a statement, so make it a good one! In just 1 year, what started out as a hobby between two bearded friends frustrated by the limited and uninspiring Beard Care industry became the go-to brand for Men’s Grooming. If you’re a modern man with high standards and an awesome beard - go ahead, join the unique experience that is the Viking Revolution and see what we are all about. The Viking Quality You deserve the best, and so does your beard. The entire Viking Revolution team is wholeheartedly committed to making sure that each and every product we offer is of the highest quality, using only premium ingredients and materials. We also supply our products in man-size quantities, so they won’t run out before you’re ready. Our scents are carefully curated to keep them fresh and masculine without being overwhelming, and wherever possible we use natural formulations and avoid including harsh, unnecessary chemicals that aren’t kind to your skin or the planet. The Viking Promise Grow and care for your beard in complete confidence. We are completely sure that you will love every one of our products, but if for any reason you’re not happy with any item from our beard care range, just let us know and we will fix it. We are proud that our results speak for themselves, and that once you have experienced the feel of a Viking Revolution beard, you’ll never go back. If you’re ready to up your grooming game, try the latest men’s beard care products and find out why we have taken the industry by storm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m a convert - wish I’d known sooner !!
reviews.reviewText: This product is excellent value for the money. I’m new to using a straight edge razor and I have to say it is easy to pick up (5 minutes after watching a youtube video - don’t be scared! Ignore all the nay sayers about you slashing yourself). There are simple rules : Always keep the blade angled off your skin at around 30 degrees, always keep the blade perpendicular to the direction of travel and don’t force (think dragging vs forcing). If the edge perpendicular to the direction of travel you will slash (think about it!).From a product standpoint, it is a well made handle and the blades are plenty sharp! The handle takes a little bit to figure out from a blade replacement standpoint but there’s plenty of youtube videos to sort you out. The handle is comfortable, ergonomic and a good weight. I would like the handle to be a bit longer but that’s just me, not the product. I used regular shaving foam and the shave is really close, like baby skin close! So much better than the disposable stuff and you’re not filling in landfills with plastic! Our fore-bearers got this right!! And what’s not manly about being able to use a single blade to shave !! Don’t tell the ladies but these shavers/razors would probably be good for leg hairs too !!! 😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for almost a year now. It is a great product, easy to use. The only problem I encountered earlier was that if I left blade in after shave, it would somehow corrode the razor, so I always remove the blade after shave. It is truly value for money product. And I am hoping to use it for few more years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Sharp
reviews.reviewText: The construction of this razor is solid. Metal components feel solid and add a nice weight to the handle. I had an issue with the blade not properly securing to the holder with the initial product, likely due to some loose tolerances of the assembly. It was replaced however and the blade is much more secure. The product box has a nice design as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time purchasing this item because I gifted one. We absolutely love it but one has to make sure to know how to safely use it because the first few uses we would get cuts. I love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super sharp, very nice!
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for personal use. It feels good while holding it and using it. Razors are very sharp, good for more than one use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this razer does over time have rust build up if it is not dried off afterwards, so it is an alloy of stainless steel not 100 percent stainless steal just because stainless steel's rust is white at first when this rust was brown.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality actually not that bad feels It's like it's not cheap blades are definitely sharp definitely a good deal for your dollar trust me this is the way to go 5 out of 5 better than what I expected that's for sure .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First time using a straight razor
reviews.reviewText: A little embarrassed, over 50 years old and I’ve never used a straight razor ever. Been finding all kinds of shaving soaps and other shaving stuff online lately and wanted to give this a try.I’ve been using their brand pomades for a while, so it was safe to say that the company‘s been around for a little while.The razor and blades came in the nice little box, which would make a great gift for someone. Comes with instructions in case you’ve never used a straight razor before… I had a little bit of an issue reading the print, even with reading glasses.Inserting the single use razors was pretty easy, took me a little bit to figure out how to get them out but with more use it’s becoming easier.Found instructions online on how to hold a straight razor, I was very shaky the very first time, but didn’t cut myself.I was a little nervous about the price being so low but to my surprise it seems a very, very nice quality razor, doesn’t feel cheap in any way.I tried using the single use blades a second time, and the shave was not as good so definitely one shave per razor depending on your facial hair.Im thinking about buying one for my brother as a gift and then another one for my self to keep in my gym bag.The only thing I would change is maybe the printed instructions that would be a little bit easier to read for us older chaps.
Fácil de ensamblar viene con navajas de repuesto que además son fáciles de ensamblar, al utilizarla es bastante segura y de fácil agarre

Got it 2 years ago when I first started growing my beard.I never tried other ones, so I don't have a frame of reference, but there's a reason why I never tried other straight razors: I never had any issues with this one and I'm still loving it, so why would I mess with a good thing?!?!
Ben rifinito, comodo da usare e soprattutto robusto. 🔝🔝

!WICHTIG! Die Klingen sind sehr scharf und sowohl beim einsetzen und Wechseln der klingen, als auch bei der Nutzung des Messers sollte höchste Vorsicht gelten, da ein Schnitt deutlich schneller passieren kann, als man denkt und auch stark bluten können.Nun zu meiner eigentlichen Rezension:Ich war bereits seit längerer Zeit auf der Suche nach einem Rasiermesser, da ich genau so präzise arbeiten wollte wie die Herren beim Friseur und dies mit handelsüblichen rasieren gerade an den Konturen nicht möglich ist oder auch einzelne Härchen am Kinn nicht leicht zu erreichen sind.In der Drogerie zahlt man knapp das Doppelte und erhält lediglich 4 Wechselklingen, also ein schlechter Witz im Vergleich zu diesem Produkt.Die Verpackung wirkt edel und auch das Rasiermesser selbst ist überraschend gut verarbeitet und erledigt seinen Dienst wunderbar.Was mit sehr gut gefallen hat ist, dass noch eine Anleitung für Anfänger bei liegt wie man das Messer zu nutzen hat und wie man so Verletzungen vorbeugen kann.

reviews.reviewerName: Very good product to clean airwax.
reviews.reviewText: Looks a little bit shabby, but overall a good razor.
